question: What is the spatial relationship between the initial brain MRI (Fig-1) and the C-spine MRI (Fig-2) in the compound image based on their bounding box locations?
gt: Fig-1 (initial brain MRI) is positioned to the left of Fig-2 (C-spine MRI) in the compound image.
